twitch-settings.subtitle: Twitch integration with streams including chat bot and API access. If you stream on Twitch, you definitely want this on.
twitch-settings.bot-oauth-note: You can get this by logging in with the bot account and going here: <1>https://twitchapps.com/tmi/</1>
twitch-settings.bot-settings-copy: A bot can interact with chat messages and provide extra events for the platform (chat events, some notifications) but requires access to a Twitch account. You can use your own or make a new one (if enabled on your main account, you can re-use the same email for your second account!)
twitch-settings.bot-chat-history: How many messages to keep in history
twitch-settings.bot-chat-history-desc: Chat logging allows for pages and modules to read messages from chat. It's recommended to keep chat logging enabled with a reasonable history size (eg. 6)
